price: Ku nshuro ya gatanu (umugore arahira yisabira) ko uburakari bwa Allah bwamubaho niba (umugabo we) ibyo avuga ari ukuri.
arabic: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةَ أَنَّ غَضَبَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهَآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wal-khāmisata anna ghaḍaba al-lahi ʿalayhā in kāna mina al-ṣādiqīna
